summary: Provides a comprehensive test suite for a hybrid encoder‑decoder speech recognition model that combines RNNT and CTC losses with byte‑pair encoding, covering model instantiation, decoding configuration, forward computation, checkpointing, and vocabulary management.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the hybrid RNNT‑CTC BPE speech model to guarantee reliable transcription performance in production speech‑to‑text services.
